title: A perfect sequel
review: The way this movie connects to the first one is unreal! They did an amazing job with the limited budget they had. Just as good as the first one.

title: A masterpiece
review: This has to be one of the greatest supernatural haunting movies in the last twenty years.

title: The Ultimate Horror Experience
review: The perfect amount of gore, great atmosphere, & the Cinematography was / and is still outstanding.
